channel.title: Technology on David Saltares
channel.description: Recent content in Technology on David Saltares

item.title: The future of affordable high end Android phones
item.description: The Google Nexus product line has always been the reference when it came to affordable high end smartphones. However, that seems to have changed a couple of days ago, the second the Nexus 6 was announced with a starting price tag of $649. Let us not forget that one could get a Nexus 5 for only $349. As many have pointed out, this is most likely Google’s response to the pressure other vendors have put on the former.
